actions.Multiattack: The tlincalli makes two attacks: one with its longsword or spiked chain, and one with its sting.
actions.Longsword: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d6 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.
actions.Spiked Chain: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d6 + 3 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 11+1d6 + 8) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the tlincalli can't use the spiked chain against another target.
actions.Sting: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d6 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14+1d6 + 11 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. If it fails the saving throw by 5 or more, the target is also paralyzed while poisoned. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
